about_the_game:
“Out Of This World” takes you on a journey inspired by one of the richest and most diverse eras of electronic music. Giving respect to the artists of the time, whilst transporting you to the heady and sweaty days of raves, great music and mutual love for your brothers and sisters on the dancefloor.

Music and games went hand in hand, but 1993 broke down all barriers, and knocked on the door of the harder and the darker. Games got tougher, so did the music, and the crowd went with it.

Enter the world of arcade games fuelled by music that took you places. Step into the new reality of Arcade Paradise VR.

Arcade Paradise VR – Out Of This World
Yours Forever - Kieron Pepper
Million - SOXXY & Kieron Pepper ft. Tia Ice
Systems - Ivar & The Horde
I'm A Dreamer - Ellie Taylor
Megabyte - SOXXY & Kieron Pepper
Step Into The World - Ellie Taylor
Take Me To Your Leader - James Mackie & Kieron Pepper ft. Imani
Horizons - Kieron Pepper feat. Ellie Carballeira
Orbs - Bob Earland & Kieron Pepper
Lunar Landing - Kieron Pepper
The Future Is Now - GOOSEWING & Kieron Pepper

“Out Of This World” takes you on a journey inspired by one of the richest and most diverse eras of electronic music. Giving respect to the artists of the time, whilst transporting you to the heady and sweaty days of raves, great music and mutual love for your brothers and sisters on the dancefloor.

Music and games went hand in hand, but 1993 broke down all barriers, and knocked on the door of the harder and the darker. Games got tougher, so did the music, and the crowd went with it.
